title: The COVID-19 Playbook | Guests: Gov. Greg Abbott & Matt Ridley | 4/22/20 | The Glenn Beck Program
description:
Who drafted the world’s response to the coronavirus? Tonight at 9 p.m. ET, Glenn unpacks “Event 201,” Bill Gates, and why the media gives the WHO the final say. YouTube joins Facebook in throttling information disagreeing with the WHO. Texas Oil & Gas Association President Todd Staples provides a look at the state of American energy. British writer Matt Ridley, famous for debunking overreactions, argues why we SHOULD be concerned about suffocating the economy. Glenn has shocking new info on the WHO’s director-general that the media doesn’t want known. Texas Gov. Greg Abbott joins to describe how Texas is leading the movement to safely reopen states. And can the PPP loans go to actual small businesses, not universities?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
